text: Pecola is a French and Korean children animated education preschool television programme created by Korean cartoon creator Naomi Iwata and co-produced by French studio Nelvan√©, and aired on TF1 and Tfou! from 2021 to the present, the show will also be shown on the upcoming Nick Jr. series Kawaii Club. It aired its first episode on September 3, 2001. It ended on September 18, 2002. Category:2002 Canadian television series endings Category:Canadian children's television series
title: Pecola
